about_the_game:
Indie developers have carefully constructed this top-down modern zombie rogue-lite action game that takes you into a post-apocalyptic world full of tension and wonder. Here, you will be a survivor, traveling through the ruins of the zombie-occupied city, exploring mysterious areas, collecting precious resources, improving your survival skills, and fighting to the death against zombies of all shapes and sizes.

Diversified Weapons and Equipment

From high-velocity assault rifles to explosive rocket launchers, from small scout drones to self-learning AI partners, the game provides you with a wealth of weapon options, making every battle full of infinite possibilities.

Sense of urgency in the combat mechanics

In the face of hordes of zombies, players need to flexibly use strategy and tactics, using a variety of bunkers and resources in the environment, forcing themselves to make quick decisions between offense and defense, and feel the tension of life and death experience.

Diverse zombie ecology

From ordinary zombies to super-powered mutants, players will encounter all kinds of enemies. Some are fast and furious, while others are destructive, challenging the player's adaptability and battle strategy.

Deep Story-Driven Background

Despite the rogue-lite mode at the core of the game, the hidden plot is intriguing. As you progressively explore the world, mysteries will be revealed, and the truth behind them will be intertwined with hope for survival.

Zombie Hunt is more than just a test of reflexes and skill, it's a journey of discovery about humanity, survival and despair. In each adventure, you will experience unique storylines and face varied challenges, while each failure is a new beginning towards a stronger rebirth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported

short_description: This is a single-player rogue-like shooter adventure game with tactical elements. The once prosperous world has been overrun by zombies, and you'll play the role of the leader of the last refuge, looking for the light of survival for the remaining companions.
